title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我的心仰望你。

lineList.en: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
lineList.cn: 我的神阿，我素来倚靠你。求你不要叫我羞愧。不要叫我的仇敌向我夸胜。

lineList.en: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
lineList.cn: 凡等候你的必不羞愧。惟有那无故行奸诈的，必要羞愧。

lineList.en: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你将你的道指示我，将你的路教训我。

lineList.en: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
lineList.cn: 求你以你的真理引导我，教训我。因为你是救我的神。我终日等候你。

lineList.en: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你记念你的怜悯和慈爱。因为这是亘古以来所常有的。

lineList.en: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness' sake, O LORD.
lineList.cn: 求你不要记念我幼年的罪愆，和我的过犯。耶和华阿，求你因你的恩惠，按你的慈爱记念我。

lineList.en: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是良善正直的。所以他必指示罪人走正路。

lineList.en: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
lineList.cn: 他必按公平引领谦卑人，将他的道教训他们。

lineList.en: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
lineList.cn: 凡遵守他的约和他法度的人，耶和华都以慈爱诚实待他。

lineList.en: For thy name's sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你因你的名赦免我的罪，因为我的罪重大。

lineList.en: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
lineList.cn: 谁敬畏耶和华，耶和华必指示他当选择的道路。

lineList.en: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
lineList.cn: 他必安然居住。他的后裔必承受地土。

lineList.en: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
lineList.cn: 耶和华与敬畏他的人亲密。他必将自己的约指示他们。

lineList.en: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
lineList.cn: 我的眼目时常仰望耶和华。因为他必将我的脚从网里拉出来。

lineList.en: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
lineList.cn: 求你转向我，怜恤我，因为我是孤独困苦。

lineList.en: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
lineList.cn: 我心里的愁苦甚多。求你救我脱离我的祸患。

lineList.en: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
lineList.cn: 求你看顾我的困苦，我的艰难，赦免我一切的罪。

lineList.en: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
lineList.cn: 求你察看我的仇敌，因为他们人多。并且痛痛的恨我。

lineList.en: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
lineList.cn: 求你保护我的性命，搭救我，使我不至羞愧，因为我投靠你。

lineList.en: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
lineList.cn: 愿纯全正直保守我，因为我等候你。

lineList.en: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你救赎以色列脱离他一切的愁苦。
